Package ca.gedge.opgraph.util

Provides utility classes and functions for the OpGraph project.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
BreadcrumbListener<S,V> An interface for classes that want to listen to state changes in a Breadcrumb.
 

Class Summary
Breadcrumb<S,V> A breadcrumb maintains a linear navigation history.
DefaultServiceDiscovery A default service discovery class which mimics the standard library's ServiceLoader for service discovery.
LineIterator Iterates over the lines of an input stream.
Pair<F,S> A 2-tuple.
ServiceDiscovery A class that provides service discovery facilities.
 

Package ca.gedge.opgraph.util Description

Provides utility classes and functions for the OpGraph project.
